name: XML Sitemap
description: Generates a xml sitemap that can be submited to search engines like Google, Bing etc.

sitemap_url.label: Sitemap url
sitemap_url.info: Relataive url the sitemap should by reachable under. E.g /sitemap.xml

beautify_xml.label: Beautify XML
beautify_xml.info: Beautify the XML for better human readability. This is useful if you want to check the sitemap manually

disable_caching.label: Disable Caching
disable_caching.info: Disbales caching of the generate xml sitemap. This is useful for debug purpose
